        Parameters:

      • invalidAddressMessage

        public java.lang.String invalidAddressMessage(java.lang.String address)
        Generates an invalid address localized message. If address is valid a blank message is returned instead.
        Parameters:
        address - Address to be checked.
        Returns:
        Message.

      • cleanString

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • cleanInternetAddress

        public java.lang.String cleanInternetAddress(java.lang.String sentText)
        Cleans the text and anly allows internet valid characters.
        Parameters:
        sentText - Text sent.
        Returns:
        Clean address and converted to lower case.
